mapper.sql: GROUPBUYID, TITLE, CONTENT, IMG, MINNO, UPLOADDATE, ENDDATE, COUNT, STATE, RATE, PARTICIPANTS, MENUID, CATID, USERID, PRICE
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO GROUPBUYS () VALUES (GROUPBUYID_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{img}, #{minNo}, #{uploadDate}, #{endDate}, #{count}, #{state}, #{rate}, #{participants}, #{menuId}, #{catId}, #{userId}, #{price})
SELECT GROUPBUYID_SEQ.currval AS groupBuyId FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT g.GROUPBUYID, g.TITLE, g.CONTENT, g.IMG, g.MINNO, g.UPLOADDATE, g.ENDDATE, g.COUNT, g.STATE, g.RATE, g.PARTICIPANTS, g.MENUID, g.CATID, g.USERID, g.PRICE, op.OPTIONID, op.GROUPBUYID, op.NAME FROM GROUPBUYS g, OPTIONS op WHERE g.GROUPBUYID = op.GROUPBUYID and g.GROUPBUYID = #{groupBuyId}
SELECT FROM GROUPBUYS ORDER BY UPLOADDATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE GROUPBUYS SET STATE = 'closed' WHERE ENDDATE <= #{curTime}
mapper.select: SELECT EX1.* FROM (SELECT * FROM GROUPBUYS ORDER BY COUNT DESC) EX1 LIMIT 3
